about_the_game:
Unlocks optional 18+ Adult Only Content for KARAKARA2

Please note that:
- Screenshots taken through the Steam f12 function during or while viewing adults only scenes will result in the full screenshot being mosaic'd/blurred out
- When Streaming through Steam the game will revert to an all ages version
- When Streaming through Steam you will not be able to load save data from adults only scenes

content_descriptors.notes: Features two consensual h-scenes with mosaic with the characters Mari and Rebbeca.
